items.title: In Conversation with Alan Dimmick
items.summary: Join us for a talk with photographer Alan Dimmick in conversation with Ben Harman, Director of Stills: Centre for Photography.
items.imagealt: University of Stirling campus in black and white

items.title: Moving Beyond Description: Qualitative Data Analysis Hybrid Workshop
items.summary: This workshop aims to provide clarity on the process of qualitative data analysis

items.title: Postgraduate Virtual Open Day - 17 May 2023
items.summary: Our Virtual Open Day will give you a taste of life as a Stirling postgraduate student. You can find out more about our courses and chat to staff and students online. You'll also be able to virtually explore our beautiful campus.

items.title: Space & Place: Jennifer Wicks residency: Technical Notes
items.summary: Artist in residence, Jennifer Wicks, has been looking at the work of Norman McLaren, held in the University Archive and the Art Collection.

items.title: Space & Place: Two exhibitions by David James Grinly
items.summary: In Gallery 4 of the Pathfoot Building, as part of our Space & Place theme this year, we have two exhibitions by David James Grinly.
items.imagealt: Photos in frames hung on a wall

items.title: Space & Place: a selection from the permanent collection
items.summary: Celebrating the inspiration and sustenance that buildings and outdoor spaces provide for us, especially here on campus.

items.title: Space & Place: The Pathfoot Building
items.summary: The Pathfoot Building is an outstanding example of post-war modernist architecture and is widely recognised to be of international significance. During this yearâ€™s exhibition theme Space & Place we are taking the opportunity here to celebrate the design of this building, home to the Art Collection and an integral part of the history of the campus.
items.imagealt: Black and white aerial view of the Pathfoot Building
